website_summaries.verdict: The best wheel-rim combination pack for emergency wheel replacement or upgrade projects.
pros: Combo pack includes a basic road tire that provides decent traction and performance
Rim uses a five-hole pattern common with most modern trailers
Wheel set includes two individual tires and rims
cons: Rims may not be compatible with all trailer types

customer_reviews.title: They were pumped up and ready to go when they arrived which was nice.
customer_reviews.text: The tires came quickly and are cheaper in a set of two than getting one of the old tires replaced at a shop, for this reason it is a no brainer. The only downside is they came not boxed up but just out in the open connected by ties. I can see them sometimes being damaged in shipping, but they are tires so not much can happen. They were pumped up and ready to go when they arrived which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I did my research and couldn't be happier with my choice
customer_reviews.text: WOW...I am so impressed with these tires! and I cant believe how fast they came in. I received my order within two days, and the quality of the rims and tires was far more then expected, You don't get this quality tire for this price anywhere, I did my research and couldn't be happier with my choice. Thanks eCustomRim !
customer_reviews.author: Arthur James

customer_reviews.title: The cheapest and likely best option.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because it costs less now to buy new tires and rims than to mount new tires on old rims. So what the heck. They're the cheapest option available, but the materials appear to be good quality. No idea how the rubber will hold up but all tires are made overseas now basically, so this is no different. If they meet DOT spec, good enough. I compared with Load Star and other brands and I'd bet it's all the same stuff from over seas. Rim is nice enough, decent powder coat paint, looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Swedish Cars

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a set in 2017, they sent radials that ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a set in 2017, they sent radials that were okay. I ordered another set to go with the set purchased last year on tandum axle pontoon trailer. The set that I ordered this year were ply tires and taller/wider than previous set. Now the trailer is not blance placing all the weight on the front set (radials) can't swap them as the ply tires rub frame when on front axle.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just put 2000 miles on them and they still look new.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets of these for my 25ft camper, 3350lbs/5000lbs GVWR Dual Axle. They came packaged in boxes, which was nice, as I have purchased tires before and they just shipped them as is. I towed the camper the next week from Indiana to Florida 900+ miles, they performed flawlessly, and have just returned from Florida another 900+ miles. They still look new, I have heard from some that trailer tires might only last a few thousand miles, and after ~ 2000 miles and they look great and I got 2 sets for less than I could have gotten 2 TIRES ONLY locally.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these tires and rims... They are great, they arrived in 2 days, so I got them super fast!, and I put them on and they pull great ... I got 2 tires and rims already mounted for the price of 1 tire here... I will DEFF buy again... And I'll order soon...tks... Todd /GEORGIA USA
customer_reviews.author: todd thames

customer_reviews.title: They look great and can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Took my 40 year old tri hull to the lake yesterday. Tires run nice and smooth. My ramp is only 5 miles from my house so I expect these wheels and tires to last many years. Couldn't believe how fast they got to me. After a couple years, the wheels and tires are still working and looking like new. The wheels are showing no signs of rust or paint flaking.
customer_reviews.author: David Young

customer_reviews.title: Best price I could find on replacement tires for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Best price I could find on replacement tires for my pontoon bunk trailer. These tires have seen about 1000 miles so far and look brand new. I am confident that I shouldn't need to replace for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Warped wheel
customer_reviews.text: I received these items on 2/1/16 but because boat was winterized I didn't put on the trailer till around 4/10. Pulled the boat 4/15 and noticed one wheel wobbling. Lug nuts were tight so it must be a warped wheel and Johnsons tells me to contact the mfg. seems as though Johnsons should be the ones to handle the situation. Will buy nothing else from them and need some 12" also. Will order from etrailer.com.
customer_reviews.author: Bub

customer_reviews.title: Price is right
customer_reviews.text: Actually the same price as buying just the tires and then paying to have them mounted on the old, rusty rims. Bonus is I don't have to take the tires up the road to the tire place and wait to have them mounted. Looks like good quality, have to see how they hold up over time
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hill

customer_reviews.title: The wheel and tire combo are basically what I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: The wheel and tire combo are basically what I expected with the exception of them not truly being what is shown as a representation of what I was buying. The wheels Do Not have the pin striping as shown and expected to match my other wheels. Thanks Phil
customer_reviews.author: r1150rt

customer_reviews.title: Blue Ridge or Bust!
customer_reviews.text: Got these very quickly, and they were what I needed. We are about to make our annual trip from Florida to the mountains, and wanted to make the trip on new tires. Very good price and they appear to be good quality. I will report back if they give me any issues but I have seen a lot of good reviews, so I expect they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Good tires, arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 5 x 10 light duty utility trailer. You will need to have these tires balanced before installation. My local shop charged $20.00 for this service. Tires arrived in great shape. I will be installing them today.
customer_reviews.author: William Hester

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: These tires were exactly what I was looking for!!! They came to the house pretty quick & I finally got the chance to put them on my pop-up camper. They look like they might be a hair taller but that is just fine with me. I gives me a little better clearance for some of the places I go camping.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put a lot of miles on these but I've been pretty happy, so far. They came inflated and ready to use, fit perfectly on my boat trailer and made for a smooth move out of a back field and a few miles away. I can't attest, yet, to how long they'll last, but the tread is pretty beefy and a very quick and convenient option for new trailer tires.
customer_reviews.author: D. A.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like I got a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I put two of these on a 2200 lb pop up tent trailer and towed it on a 2500 mile road trip from the northwest to the southwest and back again, over mountains and deserts, pavement and gravel, with temperatures getting up to 115 degrees. Didn't have a single problems with the tires and the treads aren't even worn much. Never even had to put any air in them for the whole trip. Seems like I got a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Muchmore

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, great price
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my Pop up camper, they seem to be great and fit perfect. For the price you can’t go wrong.

customer_reviews.title: Watch the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great tires but you can find them cheaper keep looking

customer_reviews.title: Nice camper tires
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, USA-made rims and high quality tires. If you want a matching set order them together otherwise you might get a different tire and/or rim if ordered separately. I ordered one to make sure it would fit my trailer, then hit the "Order Again" button for a second but got a slightly different rim (same tire). So, I ordered them again in the 2-set and now have a matching set of rims and tires and two great spares which if I don't use will be my replacement tires someday. But for long trips it's very comforting to have two brand new spares, these are a great deal and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: JK-DJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Third set of tires for my boat storage only trailer in past 600 miles - Sits parked in sun for 363 days a year!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in cardboard boxes and appear to be good quality tires and average quality wheels. I decided to have them balanced at a local shop (no charge but a box of donuts!). IF,IF,IF you wish to balance and use any TPMS Tire Monitors, be certain to install BEFORE the balancing. I decided to install: Classic Accessories 80-082-141001-00 RV Wheel Covers to protect these boat trailer tires from UV Damage. The covers fit very well and have a rear elastic but lack a way to secure the lower curtains - I also purchased and installed: Lord & Hodge 1073A-4 Grommet Kit with Bungees to insure that the 50-60 MPH winds from the lake will not effect them.

product_meta.title: eCustomRim 2-Pk Trailer Tire On Rim ST175/80D13 175/80 13 in. LRC 5 Hole White Spoke Wheel
product_meta.description: Pre-Mounted Trailer Tires & Wheels. 2-Pack Trailer Tires & Rims Bias Ply 175/80D13 Load C 5-4.5" White Spoke 13". Tire Size: 175/80D13. Aspect Ratio: 80. Section Width: 175. Load Range: C. Tire Weight Rating: 1360 Lbs.. Maximum Pressure: 50 PSI. Tire Composition: 6 Ply. Tread Depth: 7.8/32". Sidewall Description: BSW. Speed Index: M. Load Index: 91/87. Internal Tire Type: Tubeless. Rim Size: 13" X 4.5". Bolt Configuration: 5 Lug 4.5" Center. Offset: 0". Center Bore: 3.19". Rim Construction: Steel. Rim Style: Spoke. Rim Color: White. Wheel Hub Diameter: 6.50". Lug Value Hole: 0.45". Hub Stud Size/Nut Requirement: 1/2"-20 60 Degree Cone Nut. Torque Specifications: 50-75 Ft/Lbs.. Warranty: Two Years. Pack Quantity - 2-Pack
